msbt.message: Right on. I'm tuned up and ready to roll. Who's in the mood for a little <10_5 />?<10_7 arg="180" />

If you ask me, it's never too late to make the celebration scene
Thank you, thank you. To all the hep cats and odd dogs in the house.<10_7 arg="180" />
That was, like, unreal. Thanks for tuning your dial in my direction.<10_7 arg="180" />
Right on, man. Why don't you give your pockets a glance? I slipped you a boot of the show.<10_7 arg="180" />

Thanks for making the scene, cats and kittens. My music wants to be free, so I'm gonna<10_7 arg="180" /> Oh, that's a drag. Your pockets are packed to the walls, daddio.<10_7 arg="180" />Lose some of the goods, and come see me again, you dig?<10_7 arg="180" />
